title: Studio Near UCLA w/Balcony, Parking. Westwood.
neighborhood: Westwood 90024, UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
posting_body: Designer Studio Apartment In Prime Westwood Location.
Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.
Perfectly situated in a very cosmopolitan neighborhood, The Hilgard is the ideal place to call home!
Our convenient location puts you within walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks north of Wilshire and one block east of Westwood Boulevard.
Features include spacious living areas, a breakfast bar, wood flooring, a balcony, granite countertops, central air conditioning/heat, and more!
Our residents enjoy some of the best community amenities available anywhere.
Take advantage of several public parks nearby or enjoy our picnic area with barbecues!
For questions or appointment, call us at
